question: India’s first augmented reality institute has been proposed to be set up at which of the following places?
explanation: India’s first augmented reality education and training institute is proposed to be set up in Varanasi. Augmented reality will help students of skill schools as well as those pursuing core engineering research to experience a different kind of learning before entering the real-world workplace. It will provide students from diploma- to research-level “hands-on training” on high value machines.
